section.name: Obtain the Apache WSS4J distribution
section.p: The Apache WSS4J™ project provides a Java implementation of the primary security standards for Web Services.

subsection.name: How to Download
subsection.p: Use the links below to download a distribution of Apache WSS4J from one of our mirrors. It is good practice to verify the integrity of the distribution files. Apache WSS4J releases are available under the Apache License, Version 2.0 - see the LICENSE.txt and NOTICE.txt files contained in each release artifact.

subsection.name: Current official release (closest mirror site selected automatically)

li.p: The current release is Apache WSS4J 1.6.14:
The current release of the older 1.5.x branch is Apache WSS4J 1.5.12:

subsection.name: Archive of old releases
subsection.p: Older releases are available in the archive.
